summary:
This mod adds new food.
You can cook ingredients. However, some of them have poison still.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds new recipes.
You can cook ingredients. However, some of them have poison still.
Each recipe will show up in the cooking menu with having the appropriate ingredient.

[size=5][color=#f2eda4]Installation[/color][/size]
There are two versions of main file.
Regular version is for all users.
RND version is compatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26228/?]Realistic Needs and Diseases[/url].

[size=3][color=#f2eda4]Optional file[/color][/size]
This file replace the chaurus chitin texture. The download file includes two texture files, "chitin.dds" and "chitin_n.dds".
Check the image section how it looks.

[size=3][color=#f2eda4]Translation[/color][/size]
[url=http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-4356787-1-1.html]Chinese[/url]
[url=http://cafe.naver.com/elderscrolls7/829963]Korean[/url]
[line]
[size=5][u]Recipes and required ingredients[/u][/size]

I am not good at English. I hope you'll understand my English.
author: uni_SL

files.name: Cooking Ingredients
files.changelogHtml:

- Change recipe and texture of Chaurus Pie

files.name: Cooking Ingredients
files.changelogHtml:

- Change model of stew and potage (wood soup bowl)
- new 24 recipes
